actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: Providing for the reinstatement and validation of United States oil and gas leases numbered U-12871, U-12872, U-12874, U-12875, U-12876, U-12877, U-12878, U-12881, and U-13666.

summary.text: Stipulates that certain United States oil and gas leases shall be held not to have been terminated by operation of law.

titles.title: Providing for the reinstatement and validation of United States oil and gas leases numbered U-12871, U-12872, U-12874, U-12875, U-12876, U-12877, U-12878, U-12881, and U-13666.
